channel.title: giscus on The Synical Approach
channel.description: Recent content in giscus on The Synical Approach

item.title: Enabling Discourse
item.description: Now back when I was first considering this blog, a good few years ago, I had no intention of comments. It was purely going to be a place for me to dump my ideas and thoughts and all that. Nothing less. Nothing more. As I got to thinking about it, though, I realized that, despite the risks that are inherent in opening yourself up to the feedback of random Intarweb strangers, the benefits outweigh the risks.
